message:

title: Merge pull request #25 from dpocock/dpocock-enhancements
message:
Merge pull request #25 from dpocock/dpocock-enhancements

Add 48kHz support, disable AGC

title: Add configuration option for trying to disable AGC (using VOICE_RECOGNITION mode)
message: Add configuration option for trying to disable AGC (using VOICE_RECOGNITION mode)

title: Progress bar is not cancelable anymore
message: Progress bar is not cancelable anymore

title: Grey out transcription txt that might be nonspeech
message: Grey out transcription txt that might be nonspeech

title: Fix: the removal of all tags was not persisted
message:
Fix: the removal of all tags was not persisted

See also
https://code.google.com/p/diktofon/issues/detail?id=19

title: Merge the README from the new GitHub repo
message: Merge the README from the new GitHub repo

title: Reduce font size of recorder button (was too large for Wildfire)
message: Reduce font size of recorder button (was too large for Wildfire)

title: Fix: VU-meter was not started in onStart + some cleanup
message: Fix: VU-meter was not started in onStart + some cleanup

title: More responsive VU meter + nicer recorder UI
message:
More responsive VU meter + nicer recorder UI

+ some cleanup.

title: Remove position number from recording list +
message:
Remove position number from recording list +

some cleanup based on the feedback from lint.

title: Simplify/fix audio sharing
message:
Simplify/fix audio sharing

Previous code didn't work with Dropbox and crashed GMail.

title: Rewrite audio recorder (possibly works on more devices now)
message: Rewrite audio recorder (possibly works on more devices now)

title: Use AsyncTask for the (re)loading of recordings
message: Use AsyncTask for the (re)loading of recordings

title: Register more audio file extensions
message:
Register more audio file extensions

(that might become relevant in the future).

title: Add support for incoming android.intent.action.SEND
message:
Add support for incoming android.intent.action.SEND

given that mimeType="audio/*".

title: Update to netspeechapi-0.1.3.jar
message:
Update to netspeechapi-0.1.3.jar

This version of net-speech-api does not add/change any interfaces.
The update was done only to make it clear which version of net-speech-api is used.

title: Changed the copyright owner
message:
Changed the copyright owner

    Kaarel Kaljurand -> Institute of Cybernetics at Tallinn University of Technology

title: Update to SDK Tools r15
message:
Update to SDK Tools r15

i.e. changes resulting from:

    android update project --name Diktofon --path .

title: Now using ProGuard to reduce the apk size.
message: Now using ProGuard to reduce the apk size.

title: * changed the GUI of the recorder activity: button now contains text, byte sizeâ€¦
message:
* changed the GUI of the recorder activity: button now contains text, byte size indicator is smaller and shows one place after the comma, there is no title bar

* set most of the activities to use the Light-theme (more work is needed to make the styles more consistent and configurable)

* the search bar now contains the microphone button allowing for voice search

title: * updated: estspeechapi.jar -> netspeechapi.jar
message:
* updated: estspeechapi.jar -> netspeechapi.jar

* now uploading audio files under random filenames, i.e. the server will not be able to reject the upload on the grounds that it has seen the file(name) before

title: * fixed: issue 4
message:
* fixed: issue 4

* recorder button is now rectangular

* updated version number

title: * added: app/ (full source code and external libraries, corresponding to v0.9.66)
message:
* added: app/ (full source code and external libraries, corresponding to v0.9.66)
* added: tools/ (some helper bash-scripts)
* added: images/*.svg (some icons in SVG)
